name: bloom
description: Bloom is an open-source project to show how authentication really works
author: Kyle Graham Matzen <kgrahammatzen@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:frontend
